channel.title: My Npcs Are Glitched And Don't Look Right! Help!
channel.description:
My Jogres look like this:
[IMG]http://i192.photobucket.com/albums/z26/worldscapelogos/glitchedjogres.jpg[/img]
How do I fix it?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 14, 2008, 04:26:28 pm[/size][hr]HELP!

item.title: My Npcs Are Glitched And Don't Look Right! Help!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

It was fine before I added it to the lsit of Npcs that attack. The list had jad and kalphite queen in it and I added that and a bunch of other npcs. The KBD looks messed up too.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 14, 2008, 10:49:30 pm[/size][hr]I just need to fix the way they’re standing…when they are under attack they look normal.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 14, 2008, 10:55:42 pm[/size][hr]Seriously come on…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 14, 2008, 11:55:35 pm[/size][hr][quote=“runefreak10”]It was fine before I added it to the lsit of Npcs that attack. The list had jad and kalphite queen in it and I added that and a bunch of other npcs. The KBD looks messed up too.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 14, 2008, 10:49:30 pm[/size][hr]I just need to fix the way they’re standing…when they are under attack they look normal.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 14, 2008, 10:55:42 pm[/size][hr]Seriously come on…[/quote]

omfg come on!!!

Read full topic

item.title: My Npcs Are Glitched And Don't Look Right! Help!
item.dc:creator: @IP1 IP
item.description:
@IP1 wrote:

Who knew NPC’s had downsyndrome?

Try not to double post, I dunno what is wrong. If you haven’t done much to the source, try downloading a new server base and start over. I have never come across this problem before.

Read full topic
